The DPPH free radical scavenging activity was evaluated according to Bellocco et al. [ 24]. Briefly, freshly DPPH methanol solution (10 −4 M), was mixed with 37.5 μL of sample solution (range 2.4–0.300 mg/mL), and the mixture was vortexed for 10 s at room temperature (RT). The decrease in absorption at 517 nm, against blank, was measured after 20 min using an UV-VIS Spectrophotometer (Shimadzu UV-1601, Kyoto, Japan).
